title: Muscles
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR80L
description: In the book Muscles, students will read about the different activities that muscles can help them do. The detailed photographs, high-frequency words, and repetitive text support early emergent readers. Students will have the opportunity to connect their prior knowledge and to locate details that support the main idea.
meta: jump, kick, lift, muscles, pull, push, run, smile, stretch
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
High-Frequency Words : Identify high-frequency words help and me

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
